rooms.description: Large entrance hall with Vastu compliant directionality and Art Deco elements.
Spacious living room featuring Art Deco design, modern lighting, and ample seating space.
Vastu-aligned dining area adjacent to the living room for seamless flow.
Modern kitchen with integrated pantry, designed according to local safety norms and Vastu.
Outdoor swimming pool area with deck and landscaping adhering to local regulations.
Home theater room with soundproofing, seating, and Art Deco decorative elements.
Dedicated workspace with Vastu-compliant layout to promote productivity.

openings.description: Main entrance door located in the east, ensuring positive energy according to Vastu principles.
Large windows for natural light and ventilation.
Spacious balconies overlooking the living area, designed with Art Deco details.
Vastu aligned door separating kitchen and dining areas.

rooms.description: Master bedroom with private balcony, Vastu-compliant placement for sleep.
Secondary bedroom with individual balcony and abundant natural light.
Additional bedroom with Vastu-aligned design for restful sleep.
Bedroom designed with Art Deco accents and adequate space.
Guest room that adheres to Vastu principles for hospitality.
Additional bedroom with personal balcony, ensuring privacy and natural ventilation.
Last bedroom offering a private space with Vastu compliant layout.

openings.description: Each bedroom features a balcony with scenic views and fresh air.
Staircase connecting ground floor to first floor following Vastu principles.

additional_features.description: Intricate geometric patterns, chrome accents and streamlined forms in line with Art Deco style throughout the townhouse.
The layout of rooms adheres to Vastu Shastra principles for optimal energy flow and well-being.
